title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 252 of 2023), hereby
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Circular Economy and Miscellaneous
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Circular Economy and Miscellaneous 
Provisions Act 2022 (Commencement of Certain Provisions) (No. 3) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited circular economy miscellaneous provision act 2022 (commencement certain provisions) (no 3) order

title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 252 of 2023), hereby
(Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 252 of 2023), hereby
heading: 2. The 1st day of July 2023 is appointed as the day on which the following
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of July 2023 is appointed as the day on which the following 
provisions of the Circular Economy and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022 
(No. 26 of 2022) shall come into operation: 

(a) 

section 5(2); 

(b) 

section 16(b). 

GIVEN under my hand, 

28 June, 2023. 

OSSIAN SMYTH, 

Minister of State at the Department of the Environment, 
Climate and Communications. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 7th July, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [345] 3
